XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="ArticleStatistics" displayName="ArticleStatistics" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="habrAnalytics.ArticleStatistics" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="author" displayName="Автор" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All author" allDisplayName="author" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="article.author" name="author" displayName="автор" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="article.habrId" name="habrId" displayName="название статьи" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceExpression="$e(%source.article.name,1,25)" name="name" displayName="название статьи" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="true"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="hubs" displayName="Хабы" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All hubs" allDisplayName="hubs" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="article.hubs" name="hubs" displayName="хабы" disabled="false" list="true" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="dateOfPublication" displayName="Дата публикации" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All dateOfPublication" allDisplayName="dateOfPublication" sourceProperty="article.dateOfPublication" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="dateOfPublication" displayName="год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfPublication1" displayName="месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfPublication2" displayName="день" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="dateOfImport" displayName="Дата измерения показателей" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All dateOfImport" allDisplayName="dateOfImport" sourceProperty="dateOfImport" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="dateOfImport" displayName="год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfImport1" displayName="месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="dateOfImport2" displayName="день" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="habrId" displayName="Название статьи" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All habrId" allDisplayName="habrId" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" displayName="Название статьи" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="article.habrId" name="habrId" displayName="название статьи" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceExpression="$e(%source.article.name,1,25)" name="name" displayName="название статьи" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="true"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="views" name="views" displayName="количество просмотров" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="rating" name="rating" displayName="рейтинг" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="votes" name="votes" displayName="количество голосов" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="comments" name="comments" displayName="количество комментариев" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="favorites" name="favorites" displayName="избранное" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="votesMinus" name="votesMinus" displayName="голосов против" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="votesPlus" name="votesPlus" displayName="голосов за" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="integer" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <listing name="список" disabled="false" listingType="map" fieldList="views,article->url,article->name" orderBy="(-1) * views"></listing> </cube>
